item.title: Federal Workers Are Barely Making It Through the Government Shutdown

item.title: How K-Pop Demon Hunters Star EJAE Topped the Charts
item.description: Kids everywhere know her voice—if not her name. WIRED talks to the former SM trainee about her rise to global superstardom with her hit song “Golden.”

item.title: IntrCity SmartBus lands $30M at $140M valuation to deepen its grip on India’s intercity travel market
item.description: IntrCity SmartBus grew revenue by 67% last year and is targeting full profitability this year, as intercity travel booms across India.
